products.title: Turin 25mm Ocean Blue Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Introduce calming ocean blue shades into your space with their aluminium venetian blinds. An all-rounder that will work perfectly with cool greys or as a pop of colour with neutrals and wooden tones. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it fits straight onto upvc frames with no need for screws or drills. Product id: db-dpfven0372 fabric colour: ocean blue s25057 material: aluminium headrail: minimal perfect fit framework - easy drill-free installation clip slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: tilt wand, tensioned cord-free raise.

products.title: Rainbow 25mm Royal Blue T0056 Neat Fit Aluminium Venetian Blind
products.description: Their extensive range of gloss and matt finish venetian blinds, available in a full spectrum of colour. This blue venetian blind is the perfect choice to add a cosy and regal feel to any room in your home. Product id: db-nfven0015 fabric colour: royal blue t0056 material: aluminium headrail: white neat fit hardware with slide-in clips - co-ordinating cords slat width: 25mm slat material: aluminium control type: folding pull down handle, minimum projection from glass to front of handle is 30mm.
